user.title: iPhone Alarms Sync
user.description:
Choose how you want to add your iPhone/iPad device:

**Device Name** is a friendly name for your device (e.g., "Kuba iPhone", "iPad Mini"). This name will be used to generate a **Phone ID** (e.g., "kuba_iphone", "ipad_mini") that you'll need when setting up iOS shortcuts.

You can either:
- Select from existing Mobile App devices (if you have the Home Assistant mobile app installed)
- Enter a custom device name

select_mobile_app.title: Select Mobile App Device
select_mobile_app.description:
Select a device from your Mobile App integration. You can optionally edit the device name below.

The device name will be used to generate a **Phone ID** that you'll need for iOS shortcuts setup.

custom_name.title: Enter Device Name
custom_name.description:
Enter a name for your iPhone/iPad device.

This name will be used to generate a **Phone ID** (e.g., "Kuba iPhone" becomes "kuba_iphone"). You'll need this Phone ID when setting up the iOS shortcut.

confirm.title: Confirm Device Setup
confirm.description:
**Device Name:** {phone_name}
**Phone ID:** `{phone_id}`

⚠️ **Important:** Save this Phone ID! You'll need it when setting up the iOS shortcut.

The Phone ID is generated from the device name and is used to identify your device when syncing alarms.

Alarms will be automatically synchronized when you run the shortcut for the first time.

error.phone_id_exists: A device with this Phone ID already exists. Please choose a different name.

abort.no_mobile_app_devices: No Mobile App devices found. Please install the Home Assistant mobile app and add your device, or use the custom name option.
abort.integration_not_ready: Integration is not ready. Please reload the integration and try again.

edit_device.title: Edit Device
edit_device.description:
Edit your device settings.

⚠️ **Note:** Changing the device name will generate a new Phone ID. Make sure to update your iOS shortcut with the new Phone ID if you change the name.

shortcuts.title: Shortcuts Setup
shortcuts.description:
**Device:** {phone_name}
**Phone ID:** `{phone_id}`

⚠️ **Important:** Copy this Phone ID - you'll need it when setting up the shortcut on your iPhone/iPad.

The service `iphone_alarms_sync.sync_alarms` is available. Create a shortcut that calls this service with:
- `phone_id`: `{phone_id}`
- `alarms`: Array of alarm objects

Alarms will be automatically synchronized when you run the shortcut for the first time.

error.phone_id_exists: A device with this Phone ID already exists. Please choose a different name.
